docs.text: ZIPING MA maziping.im@gmail.com I am Ziping Ma (马子平), a first-year M.S. student of Peking University. I have joined the Communication and Information Security Laboratory, under the supervision of Prof. Yuesheng Zhu. My current research interests include data hiding, image generation, and deep learning. EDUCATION Peking University September 2021 - Present School of Electronic and Computer Engineering M.S candidate. Central South University September 2017 - June 2021 School of Computer Science and Engineering B.E. in Computer Science and Technology Qingdao No.2 Middle School of Shandong Province September 2014 - June 2017 PUBLICATIONS 2022 Image disentanglement autoencoder for steganography without embedding X Liu, Ziping Ma , J Ma, J Zhang, G Schaefer, H Fang 2022 IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR 2022) [Paper] [Released Code] Hiding Multiple Images into a Single Image via Joint Compressive Autoencoders X Liu, Ziping Ma , Z Chen, F Li, M Jiang, G Schaefer, H Fang Pattern Recognition (PR) [Paper] 2021 Joint compressive autoencoders for full-image-to-image hiding X Liu, Ziping Ma , X Guo, J Hou, L Wang, J Zhang, G Schaefer, H Fang 2020 25th International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR 2020) [Paper] 2020 Camouflage generative adversarial network: Coverless full-image-to-image hiding X Liu, Ziping Ma , X Guo, J Hou, G Schaefer, L Wang, V Wang, H Fang 2020 IEEE International Conference on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics (SMC 2020) [Paper]

马子平 maziping.im@gmail.com ➭ 北京大学计算机应用技术专业，硕士一年级 ➭ 来自通信与信息安全实验室，导师为朱跃生教授 ➭ 研究领域：信息隐藏、图像生成、深度学习 教育经历 北京大学 2021年9月 - 至今 信息工程学院 计算机应用技术专业，理学硕士在读 中南大学 2017年9月 - 2021年6月 计算机学院 计算机科学与技术专业，工学学士 已发表论文 2022 Image disentanglement autoencoder for steganography without embedding X Liu, Ziping Ma , J Ma, J Zhang, G Schaefer, H Fang 2022 IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR 2022, CCF-A类会议) [Paper] [Released Code] Hiding Multiple Images into a Single Image via Joint Compressive Autoencoders X Liu, Ziping Ma , Z Chen, F Li, M Jiang, G Schaefer, H Fang Pattern Recognition (中科院一区、CCF-B类期刊，IF 7.74) [Paper] 2021 Joint compressive autoencoders for full-image-to-image hiding X Liu, Ziping Ma , X Guo, J Hou, L Wang, J Zhang, G Schaefer, H Fang 2020 25th International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR 2020, CCF-C类会议) [Paper] 2020 Camouflage generative adversarial network: Coverless full-image-to-image hiding X Liu, Ziping Ma , X Guo, J Hou, G Schaefer, L Wang, V Wang, H Fang 2020 IEEE International Conference on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics (SMC 2020, CCF-C类会议) [Paper]
